channel.title: Rune-evo v2
channel.description:
im using rune-evo v2 for my server and i can see the shop but i cant buy any items from any shops because i need to get this Server has MySQL implemented, and requires it to load NPC Spawns, Item Prices, Object Spawns, and includes the Vote Database. and this the reqs
Make sure you have the database files imported Re-Enable SQL connection via DatabasePool.java Edit Database creditials in Server.java Edit the name in Settings.java to make yourself owner Run the server, then Client, have fun & enjoy.

item.title: Rune-evo v2
item.dc:creator: @i_pwn_u11 i_pwn_u1
item.description:
@i_pwn_u11 wrote:

im using rune-evo v2 for my server and i can see the shop but i cant buy any items from any shops because i need to get this Server has MySQL implemented, and requires it to load NPC Spawns, Item Prices, Object Spawns, and includes the Vote Database. and this the reqs

Make sure you have the database files imported
Re-Enable SQL connection via DatabasePool.java
Edit Database creditials in Server.java
Edit the name in Settings.java to make yourself owner
Run the server, then Client, have fun & enjoy.
